movie_title: Mushrooms: Medicine or myth? ⏲️ 6 Minute English
introduction: Mushrooms have been used as medicine throughout history, and today the medicinal mushroom industry i

vocabulary.definition: emitting light as a result of biochemical reactions
vocabulary.example: The deep-sea creatures were bioluminescent, creating a beautiful glow in the dark ocean.

vocabulary.definition: a skeptical attitude; doubt as to the truth of something
vocabulary.example: There was a lot of scepticism surrounding the new scientific discovery until more evidence was presented.

vocabulary.definition: relating to the whole rather than just the sum of its parts; emphasizing the importance of the whole
vocabulary.example: The holistic approach to medicine considers not just the physical symptoms but also the mental and emotional well-being of the patient.

vocabulary.definition: very interested in something because it is strange or mysterious
vocabulary.example: She was intrigued by the ancient artifacts and spent hours studying their origins.

vocabulary.definition: exaggerated to seem bigger or more important than it really is
vocabulary.example: The media's coverage of the incident was overblown, causing unnecessary panic among the public.

vocabulary.definition: knowledge, philosophy, and beliefs that existed before the arrival of Christianity in Europe
vocabulary.example: The indigenous tribe shared their ancient wisdom about living in harmony with nature.
